# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmod_capmod.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/cmod_capmod.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lmod_indmod.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/lmod_indmod.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rmod_resmod.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rmod_resmod.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/cmod_capmod.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> cmod_capmod.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/cmod_capmod.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;bug524son")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/cmod_capmod.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP cmod_capmod.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/cmod_capmod.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} cmod_capmod.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/cmod_capmod.cir.prn cmod_capmod.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/cmod_capmod.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED cmod_capmod.cir)
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/lmod_indmod.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> lmod_indmod.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/lmod_indmod.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;bug524son")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/lmod_indmod.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP lmod_indmod.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/lmod_indmod.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} lmod_indmod.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/lmod_indmod.cir.prn lmod_indmod.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/lmod_indmod.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED lmod_indmod.cir)
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/rmod_resmod.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> rmod_resmod.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/rmod_resmod.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;bug524son")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/rmod_resmod.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP rmod_resmod.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/rmod_resmod.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} rmod_resmod.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/rmod_resmod.cir.prn rmod_resmod.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_524_SON/rmod_resmod.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED rmod_resmod.cir)
